Text:
We've checked the main merchants' shipping records
for the capital to verify events and make sure no
innocent bystanders get in the way on the day. We
also be on the streets to monitor and guide people.

Everything's ready to make that abandoned village
the final battleground!

We've set up a network of sources to send out
false information through top secret Cult routes that
our hideout is in that village.

Just like with the Lindwurm trap, the Church is
starting to move in secret. I think our
disinformation has worked.

Discovered...a slime that reacts to sound.
Surrounded the village...with them.

We've done initial operation training at the ancient city.
They will not escape the Moonlight Sonata.
Whoa! Hey, what are you doing?!
But... I can wait...for the hunt...!
Heh! I see you're good and ready!

Did she seriously push herself to the utmost limit
through training and starving herself?!
I guess it shows a bit of thought, for a dumb dog...
Oh, scary! Let's see how you do in the field, first.

We lurk in the darkness and hunt shadows.
Shadow Garden, mobilize!

We're in position, sir. No sign of anyone nearby.
However, regarding the convoy of "the possessed"
we're tracking...

We've discovered the remains of a cage and carriage
used by the convoy, but they appear to have been
abandoned several years ago.

Which means we received outdated intel. If only
the Cult had been more generous with what
they shared with us.

Still, there seems to be little doubt that
this ghost town was used as a base by those
who intercepted the convoy of the possessed.

We'll have to see if it leads to clues about
their whereabouts or identity...

Don't panic! We've got backup on the way. Keep your
eyes on the line!

Y-Yes, sir! But it looks like the village is
surrounded. C-Could we be―
Exterminate us? You'll eat those words!
What? The music made the slime harden!
A little late to realize that!
Huh? Did you just trip on your own—

Even we struggle to predict her next move,
so there's no way you'd stand a chance.

My attacks are a little more straightforward.
Whether you can evade them is a different story.
Didn't you hear us? We will exterminate you.

But not right away. First, we will wait for someone
from the Church and the Cult of Diablos to come
scurrying to your rescue.

It is them that we, the Shadow Garden,
have business with.
The moon lights the night so bewitchingly.
Yes... A good night for someone to die!

"Shadow Garden has important work today, so I won't
be looking out for you. Alpha"
"PS. I left you a tuna sandwich. Help yourself."

So good, even cold. Ah, a feast fit for a king!
That's the stuff!

How cruel, that the Seven Shadows cannot come
and play when the moon is so lovely...
